Average partnership

IT support - not only for startups


We help startups in implementing their business plans. We build MVP and full-fledged systems and applications that meet all business goals. We do it with passion and commitment, because we ourselves have commercial products in our portfolio. This allows us to perfectly understand the business needs of our clients and gives us an advantage over companies that only produce code.


10 years of experience - and still up-to-date


At Light Code, we have been professionally involved in programming for over a decade. This allows us to look at the creation of business tools from a completely different perspective. Experience does not release us from the obligation to constantly expand our knowledge and be up to date with the latest trends – both in terms of technology and product design.

The missing piece of your business


You need an experienced business partner to be successful. Our team of programmers is what your company lacks in order to gain a competitive advantage and offer customers unique value.
